vote.title: Authorize the first renewal option of two, to the construction services contracts for Job Order Contracting with (1) METCO Engineering, Inc. in the amount of $1,500,000.00; (2) Brown & Root Industrial Services LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00; (3) RS Commercial Construction, LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00; and (4) 3i Contracting, LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00 - Total not to exceed $6,000,000.00, from $16,000,000.00 to $22,000,000.00 - Financing:  Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
vote.description: Authorize the first renewal option of two, to the construction services contracts for Job Order Contracting with (1) METCO Engineering, Inc. in the amount of $1,500,000.00; (2) Brown & Root Industrial Services LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00; (3) RS Commercial Construction, LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00; and (4) 3i Contracting, LLC in the amount of $1,500,000.00 - Total not to exceed $6,000,000.00, from $16,000,000.00 to $22,000,000.00 - Financing:  Capital Construction Fund (subject to annual appropriations)
